189692.「エクセレント！ イメージした 自分の体格に\n なれたんじゃない？ 元の体格に:
Excellent~! Are you getting used to your new
image? If you ever want to change it again,
please come back! See you~!
<end>

189693.「あら 体格を変えないの？ 残念だわ。\n 今の体格から イメチェンしたくなった:
Oh, you don't want to change your look?
That's too bad. Please come back anytime
if you change your mind. See you~!
<end>

189700.「あら お代が足りない みたいね。\n 体格を変えるなら お代があるときに\n:
Oh, it seems like you're a bit short on money.
If you want to change your look, come talk to
me again when you do have it. See you~!
<end>

189702.「オッケー！ それじゃあ 魔法をかけるわよ。\n イケてる自分を しっかりと イ:
O~kay~! I'm going to cast a spell on you.
Imagine yourself looking super cool!
<end>

189704.「ハーイ！ ここは 魔法のコスメ屋よ。\n 魔法のコスメは 体格を変えることがで:
Hi! This is the magic cosmetic... Magic cosmetics can change your physique... But they only work on humans. I'll take 3,000
gold for this.How would you like to change your physique for 3,000 gold?

189712.「……って あなた <%sM_race>じゃない！\n 魔法のコスメで 体格を変: ... You're not a <%sM_race>! Only humans can change their physique with magic cosmetics... Thorley!
